replies.body:
Just remember those [extra bonus RP ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/extra-bonus-rp-headed-your-way-limited-time)values are not relevant to the Oceanic store.

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=pEj6Ee6n,discussion-id=lhAy8tkL,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-11-12T23:26:21.630+0000)
> -EDIT- The link has been updated!

The link in the article has been updated and is now relevant to the OCE store! thanks for picking up on that. - http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/extra-bonus-rp-headed-your-way-limited-time
I think it is very poor of you to link to the NA extra bonus RP amounts. Sort of rubbing it in our face that you decreased the amount we get.
Make a new god damn skin for{{champion:83}} hes had the same 2 skins for over 3 yrs its stupid hes the only champ to not have gotten a skin in the past 3 yrs (that i can think of)

ikr, i play a lot of {{champion:83}} and he hasnt gotten any attention in years like a nerf/buff or a skin

PLZ rito do something

read this https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884-Champion-Update-Schedule#h2 apparently an up coming yorick update 

i know its a bit late

dude it took 4 years to get eve a skin they make skins for champions that see lots of play and unfortantly yorick just isnt seeing enough play look at all the skins that have come out and tell me they are not all played but im with you old champs ones that dont see a lot of play should get new skins might insentervise people to play thos champions
Where is the OCE extra bonus RP post?
Hey dude, apologies for the delay. You can find it [here](http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/extra-bonus-rp-headed-your-way-limited-time)!
Yay more money for riot.

where is the lie
{{champion:64}}
lmao ..{{item:2045}}

Hey Guys,

Thanks for pointing out the link goes to the wrong website for the bonus RP bit. We have removed the link for now and will get the OCE specific one up as soon as possible. Will edit this comment when its up.

-EDIT- The link has been updated!
buy more RP then
you announced the sale a month before you do it but not when you are actually having the sale, thank you very much for that

Am I the only one who thinks Santa Bard is a good idea, his q could be a snowball, his w could be a present, his e and chimney and his ult would make him throw a giant sack and make assorted toys dance around the stasis'd units and his meeps could be poros
When is that dragon{{champion:18}} coming out?
and yet still, the overall price of skins has gone up. we salute you.
{{summoner:2}}

All I ask is for Riot too make URF mode permanent, in the new season please. Not interested in playing Normal games (3v3 or 5v5), cancerous Ranked games or vanilla Aram. 

**PROVIDE A URF MODE **

what about with IP is anything gonna happen there i mean i wouldnt be the only person who has all champs and runes and got a ton of ip sitting around useless. Like i got 70k just sitting there doing nothing id like to use it but there is nothing at all for ip ==

WAIT WAIT WAIT. We buy skins on release knowing that it will probably be a full year until they go on sale. BUT NOW YOU'RE PUTTING THEM ON SALE. If I had this information earlier, I could have saved myself 2040 RP. Excuse me if I don't seem overly thrilled about this sale.
{{champion:157}} OHHHHHH
and how do ypu make a champion pop up???
YASUO
make some more skins for yasuo please
now i bought forsaken jayce cause i couldnt wait for a ages for a realise! Can i get anything done riot ?
Will the dragontrainer tristana skin be on sale when it is released
I really want to buy it
{{champion:4}} One Trick Pony mid all the way
So...did the November sale schedule update?
Gentleman Gnar? :c
Soooo does this mean i can hustle me a cheap yi skin...{{champion:11}}

Wait so will the normal skin sales for 50% will still be on or is the 50% weekly sales replaced by the early sale

Plz answer, cause IBlitzcrank is so close to being 50% and it would crush my heart if it got replaced

They should make more skins for champs that have the same old skins for the past years. 
Spice things up in the shop abit . {{champion:266}} {{champion:150}}
Will dragontrainer tristana be on sale when it comes out?

a) I don't think they should be opening the vault for past legendary skins so often.
b) We need a Christmas-themed Zyra ... something with holly & ivy would be apt
I don't like the fact that its not going to be a "50% off". Also why are there no 520rp skins on sale, many people might like the low priced skins in their inventory.
